data.title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
data.description: Learn full-stack web development from scratch
data.about: This comprehensive course covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and database management. Perfect for beginners who want to become professional web developers.
keyPoints: Master HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript
Build responsive websites and web applications
Understand Node.js and Express.js backend development
personas: Students looking to build portfolio projects
Freelancers wanting to expand skill set

reviews.comment: Excellent course! Very comprehensive and well-structured.

data.title: React Native Mobile App Development
data.description: Build mobile apps for iOS and Android using React Native
data.about: Learn to create cross-platform mobile applications using React Native framework. Covers navigation, state management, API integration, and deployment to app stores.
keyPoints: Build cross-platform mobile apps with React Native
Integrate with REST APIs and handle data
Implement push notifications and device features
Deploy to iOS App Store and Google Play Store

reviews.comment: Great course for mobile development. Very practical approach.

data.title: Modern UI/UX Design with Figma
data.about: Learn the principles of user interface and user experience design using Figma. Master design systems, prototyping, user research, and create stunning digital products.
keyPoints: Master Figma for professional design workflow
Conduct user research and usability testing

reviews.comment: Amazing design course! Really improved my UI/UX skills.
